rules:
{'econom' 'business' 'uberstart' 'uberx' 'uberselect' 'ubernight'} contains tariff
and success_order_flg is false
and (payment_type = 'способ_оплаты_нал' or order_cost = 0)
and {'москва' 'санкт_петербург' 'saint_petersburg' 'moscow'} contains city

{'econom' 'business' 'uberstart' 'uberx' 'uberselect' 'ubernight'} contains tariff and  success_order_flg is false and payment_type != 'способ_оплаты_нал' and complete_rides >1 and order_cost <= 50 and order_cost >=1 and cancellation_policy_tag is false and cancel_distance_raw <=50 and driver_waiting_time >= 10 and driver_late_time <= 5 and paid_cancel_tag is true and (final_transaction_status = 'clear_success' or final_transaction_status = 'hold_success')
and payment_type != 'способ_оплаты_корпоративный'
and payment_type != 'corp'

{'econom' 'business' 'uberstart' 'uberx' 'uberselect' 'ubernight'} contains tariff and complete_rides > 1 and paid_cancel_tag is false and success_order_flg is true and payment_type != 'способ_оплаты_корпоративный'
and payment_type != 'corp'
